title: No price revision for LAUGFS gas in June
byline: There will be no price revision for LAUGFS Gas domestic cylinder refills  in June, LAUGFS Gas Director and Cluster CEO Dr. Niroshan J. Pieries said.

title: Names of members elected to CMC gazetted
byline: The Election Commission has gazetted the names of members who have been elected to the Colombo Municipal Council (CMC), it was reported today,.

title: Health experts urge calm as new Covid subvariants found in Sri Lanka
At least seven dead after Russian bridge collapses on to train
byline: At least seven people have died after a highway bridge collapsed on to railway tracks in Russia close to the Ukraine border, according to emergency services.

title: Private bus fare revision postponed until August: Gemunu
byline: The Lanka Private Bus Ownersâ€™ Association (LPBOA) announced today that it has decided to postpone the annual bus fare revision, which typically takes effect in July, until August.

title: Rise in dengue, chikungunya, influenza among children: Pediatrician
byline: There has been a noticeable rise in illnesses such as dengue, chikungunya, and influenza among children in recent weeks, Lady Ridgeway Hospital (LRH) Consultant Pediatrician Dr. Deepal Perera said

title: Mayors, chairpersons of 164 local bodies gazetted
byline: Names of more than 164 local bodies have been gazetted by the Commission of Elections today.

title: Wife killed, husband injured in motorbike accident
byline: A woman was killed and her husband injured when the motorbike they were riding collided with a bus plying to Colombo from Hambantota.
